Package it.polimi.se2018.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer
    A class can implement the Observer interface when it wants to be informed of changes in observable objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigImporter
    Reads from file system the configuration file and imports the configs specs
    ConfigImporterTest
    Test for ConfigImporter class
    FileFinder
    Class that manages the access to xml files (toolCards and windowPatterns).
    FileFinderTest
    Test for FileFinder class
    Message
    Message class used for comunication between Model, Controller, View, Server, Client
    MessageTest
    Test for Message class
    Observable
    This class represents an observable object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ControllerBoundMessageType
    Enum of all types of controller bound messages
    Move
    Enum for each kind of move that can be performed during game play
    ViewBoundMessageType
    Enum of all types of view bound messages
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadBehaviourRuntimeException
    The class BadBehaviourRuntimeException is a form of RuntimeException that is thrown when something that according the software logic should not happens and the recover from the situation is impossible.
    BadDiceReferenceException
    The class BadDiceReferenceException is a form of Exception that is thrown when is request to perform an action on a dice that does not exists or is not contained in the array / group where it is looked for.
    EmptyListException
    The class EmptyListException is a form of Exception that is thrown if a list that may be used in a method execution it is empty even if it should not.
    NoConfigParamFoundException
    The class NoConfigParamFoundException is a form of Exception that is thrown if ConfigImporter receives the request for a property that can't find in the setted config file.
    NoSuchParamInMessageException
    The class NoSuchParamInMessageException is a form of Exception that is thrown if a given message has not the parameter that is asked to retrieve.
    ValueOutOfBoundsException
    The class ValueOutOfBoundsException is a form of Exception that is thrown if a specified value is out of the bounds that are implicit for that kind of object.
